3.0.1: - (Optimization) Disabled ParticlesJS for the time being. This will be returned as an option in the future.
- (Optimization) Fill in more score table data for GFDM.
- (soon™️) I've started rival support, but it's not ready just yet. Stay tuned!
3.0.2: - (Feature) Added toggle for disabling/enabling this popup
- (Feature) Fill in more profile data on personal profile view
- (Fix) DDR player weight can now be set (kinda)
3.0.3: - (Feature) New profile badges! I'll be working on a backend for these soon™️
- (Optimization) Fix this box's formatting on mobile.
3.0.4: - (Feature) Add performance event flag settings for SOUND VOLTEX EXCEED GEAR
3.0.5: - (Feature) Add profile badges based on Discord server roles. Expands Discord linking capabilities.
3.0.6: - (Major) Replace non-standard game cards with a standardized and new header card. May break some layouts so PLEASE REPORT BUGS!
- (Feature) Create song detail page, not yet completed or reactive.
- (Bugfix) Fix issue where deleteSession fails if the session has already been deleted.
- (Minor) Edit ring color on red buttons
- (Bugfix) Fix incorrect prop types for Notes Radar
3.0.7: - (Major) Song data page now loads data. This data is quite broken for a few games so EXPECT BUGS!
- (Optimization) Add in table data for games, still missing some data but the basics are complete now.
3.0.8: - (Minor) Added game event options for Classic IIDX versions
3.0.9: - (Minor) Add additional data to the dashboard, including today stats and score stats. Add score stats to chart.
3.0.10: - (Major) Add experimental records pages, work on score processing.
3.0.11: - (Bugfix) Fix broken chart sorting for certain games.
- (Bugfix) Add spacing on mobile for personal records user buttons.
3.0.12: - (Feature) Add new game event settings to SILENT SCOPE: BONE EATER and beatmaniaIIDX EPOLIS.
3.0.13: - (Feature) Add new game event settings to beatmaniaIIDX EPOLIS.
3.0.14: - (Minor) Fix footer buttons on tables, add generic export table button for every table.
3.0.15: - (Minor) Add beta support for Pinky Crush, clean up gameDB a little.
- (Optimization) Convert dashboard to a more modular backend.
3.0.16: - (Major) Add multiple new admin features for network management.
- (Bugfix) Fix possible backend issues with better type enforcing.
- (Bugfix) Fix event data and game data for IIDX Pinky Crush.
3.0.17: - (Minor) Lay groundwork for public profile page
3.0.18: - (Admin) Adds the ability to add and remove managers from an arcade.
- (Minor) Lay groundwork for avatars in tables.
3.0.19: - (Admin) Finish admin arcade and machine pages.
3.0.20: - (Major) Add read state to network news.
- (Minor) Add session info and button to remove all sessions
- (Minor) Add text gradient animation backend, needs ported to text once finished.
3.0.21: - (Admin) Add search for user via card ID
3.0.22: - (Major) Finish first implementation of the public profile page
- (Minor) Clean up dashboard game stat box
- (Minor) Load profile name in game stat box
3.0.23: - (Bugfix) Fix bug if user has no read news
- (Backend) Insane optimization with user loading, data loading, cache parsing. (SoftieTechCat)
3.0.24: - (Bugfix) Fix theme forcing for dark mode
- (Bugfix) Fix cursor on login screen easter egg
3.0.25-oMini: - (Major ++) Move from Material Design Icons to Phosphor Icons. Icons are currently set to their initial picks, but may change (suggest a change!)
- (Major) Add initial icon animations, start work on icon color standards
3.0.26: - (Minor) Game player table is more sortable
3.0.28: - (Major) Full support for rivals across applicable games
- (Major) Move from Vue Hash routing to standard routing
- (Bugfix) Fix issue when customizing on iOS
3.0.29: - (Minor) Clean up arcade page, add button for opening owner
3.0.30: - (Major) Rewrite auth flow at backend and frontend
- (Minor) Add auth to all api calls
3.0.31: - (Major) Change all date formatting to a sortable format
3.0.32: - (Bugfix) Fix Gitadora chart data formatting issues
- (Bugfix) Filter personal records to songs with scores
3.0.33: - (Major) Condense all score tables to one parser and format
- (Beta) Add a developmental device plugin for card effect
3.0.35: - (Bugfix) Fix cursor hover state on news card and profile card
